snippet: A New Orleans city councilman has pleaded guilty to plotting to misuse thousands of dollars in federal money intended for a nonprofit organization after Hurricane Katrina.
abstract: New Orleans city councilman Jon Johnson pleads guilty to plotting to misuse thousands of dollars in federal money intended for a nonprofit organization after Hurricane Katrina and diverting some of it to one of his political campaigns.
lead_paragraph: A New Orleans city councilman has pleaded guilty to plotting to misuse thousands of dollars in federal money intended for a nonprofit organization after Hurricane Katrina.

headline.main: Louisiana: Councilman Pleads Guilty in Fund Inquiry
headline.print_headline: Louisiana: Councilman Pleads Guilty In Fund Inquiry
